data.name: QUICKN
data.detailed_description:
Shoot, blast and slash your opponents to win this dynamic top-down shooter in luscious neon colors.

===================================================================================
~265 Wishlists!!! Thank you for your support and interest in the game. Check below, game development road
===================================================================================

Pre-history:

Once Gordy downloaded the file, but, as usual, the process freezes at 99%, and what should I do?
Only you can do it!
Log in and find the error to fix it, but be careful, there are tricky bugs and pitfalls everywhere.

GUNS, GUNS, GUNS!!!

  • Each new gun changes the gameplay of the game, switch between guns for more fun!
  • You can upgrade your weapons by adding alternate firing modes!

TONS OF DIFFERENT ENEMIES!

  • Against each enemy, its own tactics of the game
  • Individual emoticon for all opponents
  • At the end of each level, there is a BOSS waiting for you.

HERE IS A COOL LEVEL DESIGN!

  • Non-linear game, you choose how to play it
  • Explore the level, try to find all the secrets
  • Solve puzzles to advance
  • Use level elements for fun

CHOOSE YOUR GAME MODE!

  • Story - to complete the game, you need to move forward.
  • Survival - survive as long as possible, reflecting waves of opponents.
  • One gun - get a random gun per level, challenge yourself!

GAME DEVELOPMENT PATH

  • 250 wishlists - Full gamepad support - COMPLITE!!!
  • 500 wishlists - Save-Load System
  • 1000 wishlists - 3d sound, new animation, more option settings
  • 2500 wishlists - Dynamic music system
  • 5000 wishlists - Local multiplayer (split screen)
  • 10000 wishlists - Online multiplayer
  • 25000 wishlists - ...

*You can support the development of the game by telling your friends about it

SOCIAL

  • Discord: https://discord.gg/45SGPutxeh

data.short_description: Shoot, blast and slash your opponents to win this dynamic top-down shooter in luscious neon colors.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 XP / Vista / 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2ghz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 XP / Vista / 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2ghz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
